NPOESSDataProduct.ProductName: OMPS Total Column Ozone Product Profile

Datum.Description: Cloud Fraction calculated within code from either VIIRS Cloud Top Pressure (when snow/ice present) or from measured N-Value (when no snow/ice present)
Best Aerosol Index from retrieval = weighted average of all triplet aerosol indices
Best Tropospheric Ozone (below 13km). Calculated from a weighted average of all tropospheric Ozone values from triplets

First Guess Total Column Ozone from the OMPS TC IP. This is equivalent to the "Best Ozone" from retrieval field for the OMPS TC. The First Guess IP calculates an initial Ozone value before all VIIRS processes are available for processing.
Residuals from First Guess Total Column IP
Tropospheric Ozone below 13km determined from enhanced residual correction for all 12 triplets
Temperature Profile used in retrieval (from CrIS)
Ozone Profile used in retrieval for Profile Correction routine
Total Column Ozone retrieved as calculated using the TOMS heritage v7 method (uses those wavelengths close to those used in the TOMS v7 algorithm)
Residuals from retrieval as calculated using the TOMS v7 method
Sensitivities from retrieval as calculated using the TOMS v7 method
Initial estimate of total column ozone within the retrieval. This represents the Total Column amount before residual, temperature and profile corrections are applied.
Total Column Ozone after Aerosol Correction
Total Column Ozone after Temperature and Profile Shape corrections
Flag indicates which triplet pairs were used in the retrieval

LegendEntry.Name: No Snow/Ice present, Wavelength Pairs = Perturbation Pairs = 308.5 - 321.0, 310.5 - 321.0, 312.0 - 321.0
No Snow/Ice present, Wavelength Pairs = Perturbation Pairs = 310.5 - 321.0, 312.0 - 321.0, 312.5 - 321.0
No Snow/Ice present, Wavelength Pairs = Perturbation Pairs = 312.0 - 321.0, 312.5 - 321.0, 314.0 - 321.0
Snow/Ice present, Wavelength Pairs = Perturbation Pairs = 308.5 - 321.0, 310.5 - 321.0, 312.0 - 321.0
Snow/Ice present, Wavelength Pairs = Perturbation Pairs = 310.5 - 321.0, 312.0 - 321.0, 312.5 - 321.0
Snow/Ice present, Wavelength Pairs = Perturbation Pairs = 312.0 - 321.0, 312.5 - 321.0, 314.0 - 321.0

ProductData.DataName: Ozone Total Column Product Profile - Quality Flags

Datum.Description: Total Column Quality (Overall quality of the TC retrieval)
Input Data Quality is not good
O3 triplet selection is not Consistent within retrieval(Ozone Triplet consistency)
Residues are not Consistent (Indicates whether the residues from the 22 wavelengths are consistent)
Solar Zenith Angle Exclusion (SZA in normal, degraded, or excluded (night) condition)
Snow or Ice Surface is within the IFOV
Solar Eclipse present (All or part of the IFOV is affected by a solar eclipse, umbra or penumbra viewing)
Best Total Column Ozone retrieved is outside of system spec range of 50-650 DU
Performance Range (Performance requirements as a function of ozone concentration in DU)
Spacecraft within the South Atlantic Anomaly (extent in percent based on Climatological data)
